title: Friend requested so the guy could flame more
body: Some guy sent a friend request to me so that he could tell me to go die over and over again, does riot do anything about that or is that just fine by their standards.

replies.body: They don't do anything about it in private chat.  You willingly accepted the friend request and opted into reading their flame.
So you are saying that you look at the name of every person you play with and will remember it for every friend request. thats pretty dumb.

> So you are saying that you look at the name of every person you play with and will remember it for every friend request. thats pretty dumb.

Or don't accept friends requests unless you actually intend to be friends. You don't need to collect friends like Pokemon.
i like this one more than the person who says he remembers every person he plays with by far.

i assume the person addet you RIGHT AFTER THE MATCH are you telling me you forget the name of the person that was most likely alrdy toxic ingame 3 seconds after the match is over???

also nope riot does nothing about in client behavior.

actually i hve names turned off in game and i spend more time looking through champions or reading light novels than reading their names i lobby. i wouldn't have brought it to the boards had it just been flame but i figured people advocating suicide would get a higher focus than me blindly accepting a friend request.

I do block them. 

They do deserve to be shamed (if you have the time to do that, given how small the probability of us meeting that one toxic player is due to ranks and the different queues, and how many of them you would have to shame per game, having to upload screenshots for proof...), but neither in-game or the Boards are convenient settings to do that, they are both highly snowflakey places where every inter life matters. Most official normie forums of big games do not allow naming, if you want to do it that much, best places are club chat, Discord, YouTube.
you block every person you report?

So you are saying you accept friend requests from strangers for no reason at all?  Of course I look at names before I accept a friend request.  How can I call someone a "friend" if I don't even know who they are?  I'm actually holding onto a friend request from some douche who flamed me all game for picking Taric jungle so I can accept and flame him when I pass up his rank in season 10 playing only Taric top and jungle.

It's not fine, but it's tough to punish. You can try submitting a support ticket with screenshots but it's still a longshot.

Also - please remove the name from your post. Naming and Shaming is against boards policy.

I mean, you went 1/11/3 and single-handedly lost your team the game. Badly.

You were clearly trolling.

Are you one of those guys who flames then reports the guy that had a bad game.
Dying 5 or 6 times is a bad game. Dying 11 times is going on full tilt and running it down.

so what you are saying is everyone on my team in that game was trolling while you defend the full damage 3 9 warwick who died 9 times. and the whole point of this was him sending a friend request and telling me to die over and over. You defending that kind of makes what i said about you being a flamer sound more accurate.
I'm not defending anyone, but I'm saying trolling in your games is probably a good way to get someone mad at you.

Hi duvey, I'd like to talk to you and these forums don't facilitate personal messages. You can look me up in the client under this name with no space. It's about attacking the behavior system. I expect duvey isn't your client name so please let me know its you.
